about_the_game:
Step into the role of a scientist from the Samsara Technologies expedition, awakening after days of unconsciousness in a devastated, post-Soviet area. Most of your team is dead, communication with the base is lost, and reality is slipping into chaos. Confused and disoriented, you must unravel the dark secrets of this place, where forgotten experiments have unleashed a living nightmare.

The area has become the breeding ground of an alien lifeform—an entity with the power to mutate and regenerate, consuming everything in its path. As the line between salvation and destruction blurs, you must use your scientific skills and makeshift tools to survive, confront relentless threats, and stop the anomaly before it consumes everything.

Abnormal Environmentals

Expect the unpredictable. Navigate a treacherous world filled with biohazards, toxic zones, and adaptive threats. Use stealth, ingenuity, and environmental manipulation to overcome obstacles and survive. The ecosystem watches your every move, so adjust your strategies.

Scientific Tools

Knowledge is salvation. Utilize scientific tools and devices to interact with the organic world in unique ways. Scanners, UV flashlights, ultrasound, DNA analyzers, and more will help you manipulate your surroundings and discover hidden elements. Gather resources and craft vital items to stay alive in the company of biological threats.

Secret Files

Secrets are born to be discovered. Seek encrypted files and hidden notes scattered throughout the environment to uncover the roots of this corrupted narrative. Shadowed history and truth will come to light. Piecing together this information may reveal the anomaly’s origin and provide crucial hints for survival.
